summary: When 19-year-old Adam agrees to do a day's driving for his mum's gangster boyfriend Peter, it takes him on a 24-hour journey into a nightmarish world of murder, sex trafficking and revenge, in the company of aging hit man Roy.
cast: Jack O'Connell|Talulah Riley|Tim Roth|Peter Mullan|Kierston Wareing|Tomi May|Christopher Hatherall|Jack McBride|Simon Manley|Anthony McKenzie|Andy McAdam|Clive Shaw|Jenny Pike|Jimmy Knights|Neil Eddy|Steven Charles Stobbs
title: Deuda criminal
